function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater","Impact":"Underreporting of disease occurrence in resource-poor regions","Mitigation":"Implementation of wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE)","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE)","People":"Population in resource-poor regions","Owner":"Health authorities and government organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of temperature and in-sewer travel time on virus detectability","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of virus detection","Mitigation":"Monitoring and controlling temperature and in-sewer travel time","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technologies","People":"Environmental and public health authorities","Owner":"Environmental and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Global monitoring of 2.1 billion people in sewage treatment plants","Impact":"Lack of global monitoring and surveillance","Mitigation":"Implementation of population-wide surveillance using technologies like WBE","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE)","People":"Global population","Owner":"Global health organizations and government authorities"}]}
